description: These text faces simply have square shaped sunglasses and, in a few cases, regular glasses. Both are constructed the same way, the only difference being that sunglasses are made with ■ and regular glasses are made with ▨. You can show an emoticon is putting glasses on by creating a series: start with an emoticon without any glasses, then make one that is holding a pair of glasses, and finish off by showing the glasses are now on it’s face. To show an emoticon taking glasses off, you simply reverse the order!  ▨-▨¬ლ(•_•) (▨_▨¬) (⌐▨_▨) (⌐■_■) ( •_•) ( •_•)>⌐■-■ (⌐■_■) ( ∙_∙) ( ∙_∙)>⌐■-■ (⌐■_■) ( •_•) ( •_•)>⌐■ (⌐■_•) ヽ(⌐■_■)ノ♪♬ ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)>⌐■-■ ლ(▀̿̿Ĺ̯̿̿▀̿ლ) ┌(▀Ĺ̯ ▀-͠ )┐ ༼⌐■ل͜■༽ (ﾒ■_■)y-～ ( •_•)>⌐■-■ (̿▀̿ ̿Ĺ̯̿̿▀̿ ̿)̄ ┌(▀Ĺ̯▀)┐ ༼⌐■ل͟■༽ (ง⌐□ل͜□)ง (७⌐■ل͟■)७ ᕕ༼⌐■-■༽ᕗ (ง⌐□ل͜□) ( ▀ 益 ▀ ) （■Д■*） (つ▀¯▀)つ ⊂(▀¯▀⊂) ˓˓( ु∎௰∎ू )՞ ┌༼▀̿ Ĺ̯▀̿༽┐ ༼ ຈل͜ຈ༽ノ⌐■-■ ┬┴┬┴┤ᕦ( ▀̿ Ĺ̯ ▀̿├┬┴┬ ━╤デ╦︻(▀̿̿Ĺ̯̿̿▀̿ ̿)
title: Square Shaped Sunglasses
